description:
Alisa and Nevula join the Hinata-Keroro Platoon hot spring outing, but Nevula has separation anxiety when the wooden wall separating the male and female baths keeps him from his "daughter." Later, the Keroro Platoon goes to a festival in Alien Town to buy a rake that will supposedly bring them good luck for the invasion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alisa & Nevula, First Hot Spring / Keroro Platoon, Struggle! Torinoichi
アリサ&ネブラ 初めての温泉 / ケロロ小隊 奮闘! 酉の市
